communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide me with the cost of operating McLennan County Jail and The Jack Harwell Detention Center for the following, 

January the 1st 2013 until December 31st, 2013
January the 1st 2014 until December 31st, 2014
January the 1st 2015 until December 31st, 2015
January the 1st 2016 until December 31st, 2016
January the 1st 2017 until December 31st, 2017
January the 1st 2018 until December 31st, 2018
January the 1st 2019 until December 31st, 2019, to include the takeover of the Jack Harwell Detention Center in September 2019
January the 1st 2020 until December 31st, 2020
January the 1st 2021 until December 31st, 2021
January the 1st 2022 until December 31st, 2022
January the 1st 2023 until November 28th, 2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,
Bernadette Feazell

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

title: FOIA - Lake Stevens PD - Veritone Documents

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All documents pertaining to the your agency's contract with Veritone (https://www.veritone.com). These documents might include, but are not limited to, the following:

- Initial Bid Documents
- Current and previous contracts with Veritone regarding any of the offerings/software
- Requests for Proposals
- Memorandum(s) of Understanding
- Any privacy impact assessments
- Any product manuals
- Any instructional materials or presentations
- Use policies and standard operating procedures
- Data retention policies
- Letters of Interest
- Usage policies
- Any informal agreements or other documents that reference "Veritone" or otherwise guide it use or the relationship between this agency and the provider or developer of the software.

Please see the following testimonial for more information on this request: https://www.veritone.com/resources/lake-stevens-pd-benefits-of-using-veritones-ai-powered-redaction-and-transcription (archived link: https://archive.is/eH7h8 )

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

J Ader
